name: Snake 98 Royale
description:
FIGHT FOR SURVIVAL IN THIS CRAZY SNAKE ROYALE!
98 snakes slither onto one big map for a winner-takes-all showdown.
A shrinking play zone forces snakes together or else die.
Snakes must eat food to grow longer than their opponents.
Outmaneuver and trap the other snakes.

CAN YOU BE THE LAST SNAKE ALIVE?
